product_name: The North Face Havoc Booties - Infant Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Designed for tiny feet, The North Face Havoc Booties for infants keep their feet warm during their first winter. Suede uppers are soft and flexible; split suede bottoms are flexible enough to make allowances for fast-growing feet. Soft fleece lining offers maximum comfort. The North Face Havoc booties feature a rip-and-stick closure for speedy on-and-off. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for tiny feet, The North Face Havoc Booties for infants keep their feet warm during their first winter.
